tool_description: Identifies seasonal patterns and cyclical trends in product performance data to support inventory planning and marketing timing decisions.

time_series_data.description: Time series data points for trend analysis

seasonality_type.description: Type of seasonality to detect: monthly, quarterly, yearly

error_messages: Data length mismatch: time_series_data and timestamps arrays must have the same length.
Insufficient data: Need at least 12 data points for meaningful seasonal analysis.
Invalid confidence threshold: confidence_threshold must be between 0.5 and 0.99.
Invalid seasonality type: Use one of [monthly, quarterly, yearly].
Invalid timestamp format: All timestamps must be valid ISO 8601 date-time strings.
usage: Provide time_series_data and corresponding timestamps arrays, optionally specify seasonality_type and confidence_threshold. Returns detected seasonal patterns and trend insights.

seasonal_pattern_detected.description: Whether significant seasonal patterns were found
